languages.text: "Вероятно, вы осуждаете меня. Вы в своем праве".
"You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."
languages.original_text: "Вероятно, вы осуждаете меня. Вы в своем праве".

traits.locale_text: "You are probably denouncing me. It is certainly your right to do so."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "You are probably denouncing me. It is certainly your right to do so."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "You are probably denouncing me. It is certainly your right to do so."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "You are probably denouncing me. It is certainly your right to do so."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「あなたは私を糾弾しているのだろう。確かにそうする権利をお持ちだ」
languages.original_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私を糾弾しているのだろう。確かにそうする権利をお持ちだ」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “您应该是在谴责我，您确实有权这么做。”
languages.original_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."

traits.locale_text: “您多半是在谴责我，您确实有权这么做。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Me condena por ello. Y está en su derecho de hacerlo, no hay duda».
languages.original_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Y me está juzgando por ello. Está en su derecho, sin duda».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ihr verurteilt mich zweifellos. Das ist natürlich Euer gutes Recht."
languages.original_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr verurteilt mich vermutlich. Das ist natürlich Euer gutes Recht."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Vous désapprouvez, j'imagine ? Ce serait parfaitement votre droit. »
languages.original_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez me dénoncer, j'imagine ? Ce serait parfaitement votre droit. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Beni suçluyorsunuz, buna şüphe yok. Suçlamakta haklısınız."
languages.original_text: "You condemn me, no doubt. It is certainly your right to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Beni suçluyorsunuz, buna şüphe yok. Suçlamaya da kesinlikle hakkınız var."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
